rescuecore2.score

Class WeightedScoreFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.score.AbstractScoreFunction
      • rescuecore2.score.CompositeScoreFunction
        • rescuecore2.score.WeightedScoreFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreFunction

    public class WeightedScoreFunction
extends CompositeScoreFunction
    A score function that returns a weighted sum of child score functions.
